text: The history of Kangleipak (present day Manipur) is divided into three major sections as follows: # Ancient Kangleipak (Ancient Manipur) # Medieval Kangleipak (Medieval Manipur) # History of Modern Kangleipak (History of Modern Manipur) ==Other websites== * http://archivesmanipur.nic.in/introd.htm
title: History of Kangleipak
